com.simonecavazzoni.algraph.controller

Class GraphController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simonecavazzoni.algraph.controller.Controller
      • com.simonecavazzoni.algraph.controller.GraphController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller.EventListener

    public class GraphController
extends Controller
implements Controller.EventListener
    Controller for graph related operations.
